name: Empty Town
description: 3D VR Horror Shooting Game with the classic laser gun play style, immerse in this high quality fiction world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 equivalent or greater Processor: Intel i3 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060  equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 equivalent or greater Processor: Intel i5 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070  equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
